CustomField.formula: IF((($User.loan__Current_Branch_s_System_Date__c-loan__Txn_Date__c) < 365), IF(ISNULL(loan__Interest_Rate__c) == FALSE || ISNULL(loan__New_Interest_Rate__c) == FALSE,(IF(BEGINS((MID(loan__Description__c,(FIND('Int Rt:', loan__Description__c,0)+7), 7)),TEXT(loan__Interest_Rate__c)),false, true)),FALSE), FALSE)
CustomField.label: Rate Changed?
